## PondSolver: A solver for game 'Pond'

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/30796250/370679505-e3f7779d-3656-4c9e-ae08-36770189f05d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6uPTGAXSAOZWG_g7nWfnf-6ImLH6stNgZGsXKQ20qpc" width="30%">
</p>

This is a solver for the game '[Pond](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pond-save-the-little-carp/id1090426612)'

### Catalog

- [x] 1.0 version
- [x] Readme eng version
- [ ] Speedup solving

### Requirement

Install the required package:

```
pip install pygame
```

### Solving

Run the solver:

```
python Game.py
```

- Drag and place blocks for the level.
- Click the bulb for the solution.
  - This might take a long time, please wait with patient.
